statements: DELETE FROM retention_strategies WHERE user_id = 100 AND conversion_status = 'active';
DELETE FROM test_results WHERE user_id = 100 AND conversion_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM test_results WHERE user_id = 100 AND test_id = 1;
DELETE FROM retention_strategy WHERE strategy_name = 'High Conversion' AND conversion_rate > 0.5;
DELETE FROM retention_strategy WHERE strategy_id = 2002 AND test_group = 1;
DELETE FROM user_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM experiment_results WHERE user_id = 100 AND experiment_id = 5;
DELETE FROM experiment_results WHERE user_id = 123 AND conversion_rate < 0.5;
DELETE FROM user_segments WHERE segment_id = 10 OR user_id = 456;
